name: Shiro Senso
description:
Shiro Senso is a platformer game where you have to avoid all obstacles and make it to the top. You play as the character Shiro Senso and your objective is to make your way through the different areas in the game. 🌳🏯☁

This is the second game I have made in a group project where we focused on making a 2D platformer game.  There are still some issues as it's not complete but it's still a cool game I decided to share 😎

🗡 Destroy the obstacles with your kunai's

🦾 Survive all the obstacles

⚡ Make your way to the end

🎶 Included Audio

🐱‍👤🐱‍👤🐱‍👤🗡🦾⚡🎶

How to play:

• Left and right arrow keys to move! ➡🔲⬅

• Up arrow key to jump ⬆

• Spacebar to throw! 🗡

• P to pause ⏸

• R to respawn 🔄
